dc.title: *Venetian letters (1354-1512) from the archives of the bank of Cyprus Cultural Foundation and other cypriot collections / edited and translated with an introduction by Benjamin Arbel. - Nicosia : The Bank of Cyprus Cultural Foundation, 2007. - 212 p. : ill. ; 27 cm.
dc.subject: MERCANTI VENEZIANI - Lettere e carteggi - 1354-1512
